elements.label: Wharf
elements.description: Here the ravages of a previous voyage are tended to, and preparations for the next voyage are made.

elements.label: Market
elements.description: Here we can sell our goods... at least the ones this Marketplace is known for.

elements.label: Location
elements.description: Locations! Everything must be somewhere, and this is here.

elements.label: A Theater
elements.description: Even those rooted firmly in the Wake sometimes get to touch upon the Glory here.

elements.label: Local
elements.description: This is here, and not elsewhere.

elements.label: Port
elements.description: We can dock here, and explore.
